blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Adrian had an existential crisis and Dan went for a run. We love brothers influencing each other.
question: Adrian had an existential crisis and Dan went for a run. We love brothers influencing each other.
answer: He went for a run and his arms hurt. Conclusion: he was running upside down, using his arms as legs.

title: Temporary
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2sua351

by Phandiction

Omega Dan was abused by his Alpha father until rescued by his aunt who finds a place for him to stay with her friend Alpha Phil Lester for a few months until he is old enough to be put up for sale.
Phil lost his omega mate two years previous to a tragic accident that he blames himself for. Now with another omega in his care, grief, fear, and guilt return, but so do some other unexpected feelings.

Words: 6087, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)

blog.name: phanfictionevents
blog.title: Phanfiction Events
blog.description:
We host various events for writers in the phandom! From prompt weeks to blind-gos to remixes (and more), there's something for everyone!

Current Event | FAQ

body:
Information About Future Events

Hello everyone!

We want to thank you all for the mass amounts of support already because we’re super excited to bring some new events to the phandom! However, we’ve noticed that some people are confused so we’re gonna briefly explain some of the events we may host!

Remix Relay:

  • A remix relay is an event where you sign up, we release a prompt, and then periodically throw in what are called remixes as you’re writing. Remixes are just a new prompt you’ll have to include in your fic. It’s just like a normal writing event, but with a twist! Future posts will explain it more in depth!

Blind-Go:

  • Logistics are still being worked out—essentially, you will receive a prompt, write that prompt, and then we’ll have a short game of where people have to guess what prompt you wrote! Meant to be a fun event!

Fic Wars:

  • Not actually a war—what this means is that you sign up and will be put into pairs (don’t have to interact or work together though!). The two people in the pair will receive the same prompt and both will write the prompt! Then when both authors are done, we post both the fics at the same time to show how each author interpreted the prompt. Not a competition and also no judgement! Just for fun to show how people comprehend prompts differently.

A Week of Prompts:

  • Not a new concept, but we’re changing it up! So we’re considering releasing prompts for a week in which phandom events normally happen like Spooky Week. We’d release the seven days of prompts ahead of time, you write the prompt on the day it’s put, submit it to us, and we reblog all of the fics written for the prompts!

We still have other events we are considering but here are some that we know we want to try out! In our best efforts to not spoil any of the events, we did purposely leave these descriptions a little bit vague! But don’t worry, we will post very thorough information posts when the events are happening!

The first event begins on January 20th so look for that!

Any other questions, just send us an ask!

-The Admins

We’d release the seven days of prompts ahead of time, you write the prompt on the day it’s put, submit it to us, and we reblog all of the fics written for the prompts!

We still have other events we are considering but here are some that we know we want to try out! In our best efforts to not spoil any of the events, we did purposely leave these descriptions a little bit vague! But don’t worry, we will post very thorough information posts when the events are happening!

The first event begins on January 20th so look for that!

Any other questions, just send us an ask!

-The Admins
